EmailTemplate.subject: Participant Information: ENSI {!Contact.Job_Public_Program_Name__c} on {!Contact.Job_Certificate_Date__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
As part of the ENS International {!Contact.Job_Public_Program_Name__c} Program you are attending on {!Contact.Job_Certificate_Date__c} in {!Contact.Job_Venue_City__c}, please read the following information to help empower your negotiation success.
Date: {!Contact.Job_Certificate_Date__c} Time: {!Contact.Job_Start_Finish_Time__c}
Venue: {!Contact.Job_Venue_Name__c} {!Contact.Job_Venue_Address__c} {!Contact.Job_City_State_PC__c} {!Contact.Job_City_State_PC__c} {!Contact.Job_Venue_Contact__c}
Go here for map: {!Contact.Job_venue_map__c}
Program Leader/s: {!Contact.Job_Presenters__c}
Dress: Smart casual
The ENSI program is not only about giving you the skills required to approach negotiations confidently but to also ensure that your learnings are sustained and become a force of habit. We believe that engaging you before and after the course will increase your learning outcomes and ask that you participate fully in the activities outlined below.
We like to promote an informal atmosphere during the workshop and casual dress is most welcome. Lunch will be provided and there will be suitable breaks during the program to enable participants to communicate with business colleagues and clients. Please advise if you have any special dietary requirements.
No prior reading material is necessary. A comprehensive manual will be made available at the beginning of the workshop.
Pre-Course Requirements 1. Program Focus Questionnaire 'PFQ'- the PFQ helps the program leader to customise the program based on your needs. We ask that all PFQs are completed by {!Contact.Job_PFQ_Due_Date__c}. Copy and paste the link below into a web browser to access your PFQ
http://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/1264861/97b47b780e94?pfq-rait&rait=NO&jid={!Contact.Last_Job_ID__c}&pid={!Contact.Last_Participant_Id__c}
Note: This link is specific to you, please don't forward to others. Please ensure Java is enabled in your web browser.
2. Please come briefed with notes on at least one current negotiation situation (for use in diagnosis and review sessions during the workshop).
Post Course: - You will receive 6 reinforcement emails sent fortnightly for 12 weeks. - Subscription to our eBulletin Negotium. If you don’t sign the subscription form at the program, please feel free to register online at www.negotiate.org.
A full list of learning outcomes is available at {!Contact.Job_Learning_Outcome__c}.
If you require accommodation, please let me know and we can provide a participant rate at the hotel/venue and/or recommend some hotels close to the venue. Parking options can also be advised on request.
Terms of Business * Registration is only confirmed on receipt of full payment * Early bird discount for payment received one month prior to start date * Group discounts available on request * Participant cancellation policy: - more than 21 days before commencement, full refund - under 21 days and more than 7 days before commencement, 50% refund - under 7 days, no refund * Transfer requests – under 14 days incur SGD 350 / USD 250 charge * Any discounts/promotions are not transferrable * Substitute delegates accepted without charge up to 72 hours before program commencement * ENSI, PwC and Coalface reserves the right to cancel any program without notice
We look forward to meeting and working with you during the workshop.
Kind regards
{!Contact.Job_CSM_Name__c} Client Service Manager
